chapter.title: Record Owner Privileges
chapter.para: If you are viewing a record which you have created yourself or which another user has shared with you, the Edit Record will show. By choosing to edit a record, you open a record inside the editor. You can correct mistakes, add content, add notes and abstracts etc. If you are sharing records within a group, each member of the group can participate in adding information to the record.

If you are viewing a record which you have created yourself or which another user has shared with you, you can also delete it. First click : and a pop-up window will ask you to confirm your intention to delete.

You can move any file you can edit to a folder you control, for example, to a folder within your own "Home" folder for finished records, to a folder used for having records checked by another user, or to a folder that is common to your group.
You can also Create Related MODS Record .
The next sections explains Tamboti's Basic Input Forms.
